function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Massive and diverse 5G-based robot systems in hospitals","Impact":"Increased potential for cross-contamination and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict sterilization protocols for robots and their usage areas","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, antimicrobial materials, autonomous sterilization robots","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"High network capacity for concurrent communication and data transmission","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of misinformation and inaccurate medical advice","Mitigation":"Implement secure network protocols, fact-checking mechanisms, and data encryption","Technologies":"Secure network protocols, data encryption, fact-checking algorithms","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, remote medical consultants","Owner":"Hospital IT department"}]}
